1. In a clean, dry glass container, weigh out 0.5 grams of arsenic.
2. Next, add 2.5 grams of sodium to the arsenic.
3. Incorporate 1.5 grams of phosphorus into the mixture.
4. Add 0.4 grams of rubidium to the blend.
5. Finally, mix in 0.1 grams of scandium.
